changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', n.name_id) AS taxonID, (CASE WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) = 'family' THEN n.family WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) ='subfamily' THEN concat(n.family, ' subfam. ', ifnull(n.infraepi,'')) WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) = 'genus' THEN n.genus WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) IN('series', 'subgen.', 'sect.') THEN concat(n.genus, ' ', ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank), ' ', n.infraepi) WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) = 'species' THEN concat(n.genus, ' ', n.species) WHEN ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) IN('subspecies', 'subsp.', 'var.', 'forma') THEN concat(n.genus, ' ', n.species, ' ', ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank), ' ', n.infraepi) ELSE (CASE WHEN ifnull(n.species,'') <> '' THEN CONCAT(n.genus, ' ', n.species, IF(length(n.infraepi)>0, ' agg. ' + n.infraepi,'')) WHEN ifnull(n.genus,'') <> '' THEN CONCAT(n.genus, if(length(n.infraepi)>0, CONCAT(' infragen. ', n.infraepi),'')) WHEN ifnull(n.family,'') <> '' THEN CONCAT(n.family, IF(length(n.infraepi)>0, CONCAT(' supragen. ', n.infraepi),'')) END) END) AS name, ifnull(n.family,''), ifnull(n.genus,''), ifnull(n.species,'') AS specificEpithet, IF(ifnull(n.rank, n.infrarank) IN('subspecies', 'subsp.', 'var.', 'forma'), n.infraepi, '') AS infraspecificEpithet, ifnull(n.rank, ifnull(n.infrarank,'')) AS verbatimTaxonRak, concat(IF(length(n.par)>0, concat('(',n.par,') '),''), ifnull(n.author,'')) AS scientificNameAuthorship, (CASE n.status WHEN 'A' THEN 'accepted' WHEN 'S' THEN 'synonym' END) AS taxonomicStatus, IF(n.name_id <> a.name_id, CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', a.name_id), '') AS acceptedNameUsageID, IF(p.name_id IS NULL, '', CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', p.name_id)) AS parentNameUsageID FROM name n LEFT JOIN name a ON n.taxonNo = a.taxonNo LEFT JOIN name p ON n.parentTaxon = p.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' ##MORE JOIN CONSTRAINTS## AND (a.status = 'A' OR a.status IS NULL) AND (p.status = 'A' OR p.status IS NULL) ######################### INTO OUTFILE '/tmp/taxa.txt' FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n';

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.comment: Create description table with distribution data
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE dwc_description(taxonID VARCHAR(50), description BLOB, description_type VARCHAR(20), source_table VARCHAR(20)) AS SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', c.name_id) AS taxonID, GROUP_CONCAT(c.countries SEPARATOR ' ') AS description, 'distribution' AS description_type, 'distributions' AS source_table FROM
(SELECT l.name_id, CONCAT(l.country, ' ', GROUP_CONCAT(l.districts SEPARATOR ' ')) AS countries FROM
(SELECT n.name_id, ifnull(d.country, '') AS country, CONCAT(ifnull(d.district, ''), ': ', GROUP_CONCAT(ifnull(d.locref, '') SEPARATOR ' ')) AS districts FROM name n INNER JOIN distribution d ON n.taxonNo = d.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' AND n.status = 'A' GROUP BY n.name_id, d.country, d.district ORDER BY n.name_id, d.country, d.district) AS l
GROUP BY l.name_id, l.country ORDER BY l.name_id, l.country) AS c
GROUP BY c.name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.comment: Add 'excountry' (presented online as "Range") to description table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dwc_description SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', name_id) AS taxonID, CONCAT(' RANGE: ', GROUP_CONCAT(country SEPARATOR '; ')) AS description, 'distribution' AS description_type, 'excountries' AS source_table FROM name n INNER JOIN excountry e ON n.taxonNo = e.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' AND n.status = 'A' GROUP BY name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dwc_description SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', name_id) AS taxonID, ifnull(georange, '') AS description, 'distribution' AS description_type, 'taxon' AS source_table FROM name n INNER JOIN taxon t ON n.taxonNo = t.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' AND n.status = 'A' GROUP BY n.name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.comment: Add general description to description table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dwc_description SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', name_id) AS taxonID, ############################## Does use of `taxon`.`habitat` mean habitat table ignored? CONCAT_WS(' ', ifnull(habitat,''), ifnull(altitude,''), ifnull(description,''), ifnull(notes,''), ifnull(flora_area, '')) AS description, ############################# 'general' AS description_type, 'taxon' AS source_table FROM name n INNER JOIN taxon t ON n.taxonNo = t.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' GROUP BY n.name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dwc_description SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', name_id) AS taxonID, CONCAT('habit: ', ifnull(value, ''), ' ', ifnull(search_term, '')) AS description, 'habit' AS description_type, 'morphology' AS source_table FROM name n INNER JOIN morphology m ON n.taxonNo = m.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' AND n.status = 'A' AND m.character_name = 'habit' GROUP BY n.name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.comment: Add other morphology to description table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO dwc_description SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', name_id) AS taxonID, CONCAT(ifnull(character_name, ''), ': ', ifnull(value, ''), ' ', ifnull(search_term, '')) AS description, 'morphology' AS description_type, 'morphology' AS source_table FROM name n INNER JOIN morphology m ON n.taxonNo = m.taxonNo WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' AND n.status = 'A' AND m.character_name <> 'habit' GROUP BY n.name_id;

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: SELECT taxonID, GROUP_CONCAT(description SEPARATOR ' '), description_type AS type FROM dwc_description GROUP BY taxonID, description_type INTO OUTFILE '/tmp/description.txt' FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n';

changeSet.author: jk00kg
changeSet.sql: SELECT CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:taxon:', n.name_id) AS taxonID, CONCAT('urn:kew.org:efloras:reference:eflora:', e.eflora_id) AS identifier, CONCAT(ifnull(f.flora_title, ''), IF(e.vol > 0, CONCAT(' volume:', e.vol), ''), IF(e.part > 0, CONCAT(' part:', e.part), ''), IF(e.year > 0, CONCAT(' (', e.year, ') '), ' '), ifnull(e.family, ''), ' by ', ifnull(e.author, '')) AS bibliographicCitation, f.flora_title AS title, e.author AS creator, year AS date, IF(e.vol > 0, CONCAT(' volume:', e.vol), '') AS volume, IF(e.part > 0, CONCAT(' part:', e.part), '') AS number, ifnull(e.info, '') AS description FROM name n INNER JOIN eflora e ON n.eflora_id = e.eflora_id LEFT JOIN flora_details f ON e.flora_name = f.flora_code WHERE n.family = 'Iridaceae' INTO OUTFILE '/tmp/references.txt' FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n';
